title: Samsung Portable SSD T1 Hard Drive Overview
description:
Samsung Black Portable 1TB SSD T1 Hard Drive - MU-PS1T0B/AM - http://abt.com/product/88174/Samsung-MUPS1T0BAM.html

Weve taken the power and performance of an internal SSD added cutting edge security and put it in a compact stylish case. The T1 is the perfect portable portfolio for your life. It is a new way to have your personal and professional data on you all the time.
Features:
• Superfast Read-write Speeds of up to 450 MB/s
• AES 256 Bit Encryption for Cutting Edge Data Security
• Sleek Premium Design Accentuated by Slim Compact Shape
Specifications:
• Interface: Compatible with USB 3.0 and 2.0
• Storage Capacity: 1TB
• Data Transfer Speed: Up to 450MB/sec. ( Performance can be vary depending on host configuration and test software)
• AES Encryption: AES256bit
• Security: Password setting (Optional) (User can select security option in initial registration process (For more details please refer to the manual))
